Table: array

An array is an n-dimensional grid of data, and may be associated with a table.

array Structure
F-Key Name Type Description
identifier character varying PRIMARY KEY

A globally unique identifier for this array, such as a UUID.
rows_in_header integer

The number of rows in the header of this array.
rows character varying[]

The data in this array.

 

array Constraints
Name Constraint
ck_array_identifier CHECK (((identifier)::text ~ similar_escape('[a-z0-9_-]+'::text, NULL::text)))

Tables referencing this one via Foreign Key Constraints:

array_table_map
